“Alishan” şirkəti 20.07.1995-ci ildən qe: “Alishan” company was registered on 20.07.1995. The director of our company is Adil Isa Vahid oglu. The main activity of “Alishan” company is the retail sale of pharmaceutical goods in specialized stores. In addition, our activity includes retail sales in specialized stores and hotel services.
Alishan şirkəti əczaçılıqla yanaşı, həm: In addition to pharmacy, Alishan company also provides services in various fields with markets and hotels under the company
Alishan şirkəti 1995-ci ildən etibarən f: Alishan company has been operating since 1995. For over 25 years, we have gained experience and success
Şirkət əczaçılıq və nəzdnində fəaliyyət: The company offers you many services with pharmacy and hotel and market chains operating under it
